p: Table 1 presents the changes in body weight before and after 3 weeks of concomitant treatment with L-NAME and either the aqueous extract of A. digitata or captopril. A marked decrease in body weight growth was observed in the hypertensive control group ( Table 1). The aqueous extract at all doses tested and captopril mitigated this decrease. Gains of 23.36% ( p < 0.05), 94.13% ( p < 0.001), and 27.02% ( p < 0.05) were observed with doses 100 and 200â€‰mg/kg, and captopril, respectively, was compared to the hypertensive control group ( Table 1).
